text: Ogoh ʙosed, ki sumo ononro dust medored va hol on ki onho sumoro dust nadorand. Sumo ʙa hamai in kitoʙ imon ovardaed. Cun sumoro ʙuʙinand, gujand: «Mo ham imon ovardaem». Va cun xilvat kunand, az ƣojati kinae, ki ʙa Sumo dorand, sarangusti xud ʙa dandon gazand. Bigu: «Dar kinai xes ʙimired! Alʙatta Xudo ʙa on ci dar dilhost, ogoh ast»
